text: Pavol Molnár (13 February 1936 - 6 November 2021) was a Slovak footballer. He played as a forward. He played for Czechoslovakia national team in 20 matches and scored three goals between 1956 until 1962. Molnár was born in Bratislava, then-Czechoslovakia. Molnár died on 6 November 2021 in Bratislava at the age of 85.SFZ - Smútok zahalil náš futbal, zomrel Pavol Molnár ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Slovak footballers Category:Sportspeople from Bratislava
title: Pavol Molnár
